strapiPost.title: Buzzing About
strapiPost.content:
A restaurant in Bentonville has been named as one of the must-stop places to eat in Arkansas. The Hive, located in the 21c Museum Hotel, boasts refined southern cuisine that has mouths watering across the nation.

  • Top three: The Parade newsletter hit the road and compiled a list of the Best Restaurants Across the U.S. The list includes three stops in Arkansas, and the Hive in NWA "showcases the unique culinary identity" of the state.
  • Fine dining: Using local ingredients, the restaurant creates flavorful dishes that pay homage to the High South. NWA foodies rave about the brunch, dinner, and seasonal cocktail specials the Hive has to offer.

Find out what the buzz is all about by reading the article HERE.
